mil9us 6 Pairs/12PCS Silicone Thumb Grips/Analog Controller Joystick Button Covers/Caps  Joystick
description:
[ UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY ] - It Is Compatible With Play Station Ps4, Ps3, Ps2, Microsoft Xbox 360 And Xbox One Controllers, Xbox One S, Xbox One X, Wii U, And Wii Nunchuk Controllers Rings


[ QUALITY ] - NON-SLIP Gaming Thumb Grip Caps Stick Are Made Of Silicone Paddles, The Soft Silicone Material Make The Gaming Thumbstick More Comfortable And Good To Feel. You Will No Longer Have To Worry About Your Thumbs Slipping Off The Analog Stick Of Your Controllers. 


[ ENHANCED GAMING EXPERIENCE ] - Personalize And Enhance Your Gaming Strike Experience With Our Upgraded Silicone Thumb Grip Skin Caps. Prevent Your Fingers From Slipping And Provide More Accuracy And Sensitivity When You Play Video Games. It is a Dualshock Free.


[ BETTER ACCURACY ] - Improves Your Shooting Accuracy, Particularly At Mid-to-long Ranges. It Is A Dual Thumbstick Which Provides Backbone Protection And Also Against Wear And Tear. 


[ EASY TO INSTALL ] - No Tools Or Wires Required Just Flip The Cap Inside Out And Then Flip It Back Down To Wrap Around The Analogue Sticks And It Will Take Only Seconds. The Controller Caps Are Made From High Grade Quality Material That Will Ensure To Last Long

MICROSOFT XBOX S/X Wireless Controller Bluetooth  Gamepad
description: Experience the modernized design of the Xbox Wireless Controller in Robot White, featuring sculpted surfaces and refined geometry for enhanced comfort during gameplay. Stay on target with a hybrid D-pad and textured grip on the triggers, bumpers, and back case. Seamlessly capture and share content such as screenshots, recordings, and more with the new Share button. Use the Xbox Accessories app to remap buttons and create custom controller profiles for your favorite games. Quickly pair with, play on, and switch between devices including Xbox Series X, Xbox One, Windows 10 PCs, and Android, iOS support coming in the future. Plug in any compatible headset with the 3.5mm audio jack.* *Compatible with select devices and operating system versions. Some functionality not supported on Android, or via Bluetooth. Go to xbox.com/controller-compatibility for more information. Button mapping available via Xbox Accessories app for Xbox Series X, Xbox One, and Windows 10. The Bluetooth word mark and logos are registered trademarks owned by Bluetooth SIG, Inc. and any use of such marks by Microsoft Corporation is under license. Other trademarks and trade names are those of their respective owners

Xbox Series S - Gilded Hunter Bundle 512 GB with Virtual currency for Fortnite, Rocket League, and Fall Guys.
description: Throw down with the Xbox Series S – Gilded Hunter Bundle featuring nine in-game cosmetics and virtual currency for Fortnite, Rocket League, and Fall Guys. Ready to play? Since you can download and play Fortnite, Rocket League, and Fall Guys for free with Xbox, you can get right to the action. Go all digital and experience next-gen speed and performance at a great price.?Make the most of every gaming minute with Quick Resume, lightning-fast load times, and gameplay of up to 120 FPS—all powered by Xbox Velocity Architecture. Enjoy digital games from four generations of Xbox, with hundreds of optimized titles that look and play better than ever.
